subject: Just Released: 2007 Renewable Energy Wall Map With the Latest Available Data
body:
Global Energy Maps




	Special Offer: For PMA Readers

    Just Released: 2007 Renewable Energy Wall Map 
    With the Latest Available Data 

  	Buy One Map, Get a Second Renewable Energy Map FREE!!!*
  	(lamination not included)  

  	Hurry: Offer expires May 25, 2007!



 


2007 Renewable Energy Wall Map 


	The NEW 2007 U.S. Renewable Energy Wall Map provides 
	a visual framework of the recently expanding renewable 
	energy industry. 
The map displays:
Existing and Proposed Non-Hydro Renewable Energy Facilities:
		Wind, Biomass, Solar, Geothermal and Tidal projects are 
		indicated by Status, Fuel, Capacity, Owner/Developer, and Name. 
		Current as of January, 2007! 
Transmission Infrastructure: Indicated by voltage, sited using 
		the latest aerial imagery and field survey data. 
Proposed Transmission Lines: over 21,000 miles of proposed 
		transmission lines ? an increase of 14,000 miles over 2006! 
Nationwide Mosaic of the Latest High-Resolution Wind Resource 
		Data: Latest data from the U.S. Dept. of Energy?s National 
		Renewable Energy Laboratory and many other sources. 
Substation Locations: Representation of nearly 5,000
		electric grid interconnections offers greater
		information to site new projects. 
Project Locator/Data Table: Almost 1,500 current and
		planned facilities are listed with name, owner, fuel, capacity, 
		proposed on-line date and map location. 
Conventional Generation Facilities: Power Plants of 5 MW
		or greater fueled by non-renewable fuels such as coal, gas,
		oil, or uranium are indicated. 
Detailed Inset Areas: Showing areas of intense development,
		as well as Geothermal resources, solar intensity, and
		State-level existing & planned renewable capacity provide
		further definition. States with RPS?s are displayed. 
Detailed Reference Features: Cities, counties, 
		the most detailed topographic representation available, and other
		features present a truly complete view of the geographic
		issues surrounding United States renewable energy. 

To Order:


		Click here or call 303-444-2393 


		See the complete line of Global Energy Maps


		www.globalenergymaps.com 

Global Energy 
	Decisions, 1470 Walnut, Ste 401, Boulder, CO 80302 720-240-5500

To Order:


		Click here or call 303-444-2393
Offer Details:
		At checkout MUST USE coupon code: pmarenew 
		after adding two Renewable Energy wall maps to cart, you'll 
		receive a $475 discount for the free map 
			
		Offer expires 5/25/07
			
		*Maps must ship to same address; 
		Lamination not included	


	Other Global Energy Wall Map Lines:
